# Table 1
```{r, echo = FALSE, results='asis'} 
library(dplyr)
library(gtsummary)

table1 <- knitr::knit_child(
    here::here("ABC123", "report_templates", "Table1.Rmd"),
    envir = list(
      table1_params = list(dfADSL = params$dfADSL)
    ),
    quiet = TRUE
  )
cat(table1, sep = "\n")
```
